Reviews.Content: wife cousin spent week folks recommendation daughter who’s lived studied rome surprised extraordinary reviews agree completely can’t imagine gracious accommodating staff daughter joined breakfast couldn’t resist location suppose sleep piazza san pietro they’d failing hard closer vatican vehicles allowed borgo pio wonderful bonus steps fruit produce shop bakery deli wine store pharmacy excellent gelato careful they’ll overcharge delightful dining block vatican museum 810 minute walk st peter’s five buses short blocks else visit walked trips pantheon coliseum trevi fountain spanish name chance rome romans okay aren’t doing gawking days neighborhood seriously home

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful!!!! Can't wait to return!”
Reviews.Author: obwan1432
Reviews.Content: recently visited italy time family 4 hotel recommended expectations needless expectations founded actually exceeded greatly stayed 1st nights vacation sant anna traveled florence nights returned sant anna nights trip 2021 return clean roomy beautifully decorated mini refrigerator safe breakfast buffet perfect stayed bed breakfasts rivaled advertised location borgo pio wonderful little street plenty restaurants street recommend restaurants left hotel walk commercialized addition 2 blocks vatican st peters basilica able walk hotel issues castle saint angelo bridge angels spanish step piazza navona restaurants shops course attractions attractions bus system taxi staff quickly arranged speaking staff wonderful elisabetta andrea mario nice helpful treated family staff interacted extremely nice breakfast buffet staff friendly actually excited cappuccino breakfast excellent overall hotel set tone vacation wonderful cant wait return rome staying hotel sant anna

Reviews.Content: spacious comfortable american standards party 10 using 2 triples quad plenty cramped breakfast buffet included start day fresh fruit scrambled eggs pastries bread juice coffee capuccino course awesome hotel staff front desk servers cleaning staff friendly ready answer question provide tip andrea elisabetta front desk exceptional half touched base via email prior arrival multiple times time respond provide answers suggestions recommendations transport btwn airport hotel reasonable andrea proved trusted consultant site bite move city using public transport rome terrific stay st anna 2 blocks vatican location plenty temptations nearby 2 blocks step hotel enjoy dolce vita gelatto pastries pasta vino drawback elevator allowing 2 people tight quarters 3rd floor walking stairs healthy individual isnt isnt handle ground level
